item.title: @elonmusk: The more I use xAI's new Grok 4.20 and its completely visible council deliberation process during re...
item.description: The more I use xAI's new Grok 4.20 and its completely visible council deliberation process during response generation, the clearer it becomes that transparency‚Äîfrom an epistemic standpoint‚Äîneeds to become the gold standard for all AI models. Anything less than that moving forward is a detriment to both users and AI alignment as a whole.

item.title: @elonmusk: Do you really think grok 4.20 is good? I've been testing it , Visual ability is flawed. I was lookin...
item.description: Do you really think grok 4.20 is good? I've been testing it , Visual ability is flawed. I was looking at logic tests, and I'm not able to create difficult enough. However, proving theorems‚Äîwith theorem provers‚Äîis quite difficult with it; there soo many syntax errors.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok 4.20 generated a mobile game like Flappy Bird for me after just one small prompt in just a few ...
item.description: Grok 4.20 generated a mobile game like Flappy Bird for me after just one small prompt in just a few seconds. The 4 Grok Agents are incredibly good and fast.
